column5: Looks like WFN and WildTV are free previews on bell express view this month.
Would be nice if they were in HD!
WFN is free this month...in HD...on Rogers!!	Just wish I had've checked for it before Dave's first show of the new season aired
I get WFN with my package, sucks Bell doesn't carry it in HD though.
Ya, Cogeco in Hamilton doesn't offer WFN in HD either.  I've still ordered it, though, cuz nothing is better than having fishing shows available 24-7.
